title: BRIEF-Amtrust Financial Says Evergreen Will Get $33 Mln Termination Fee From Co In Certain Circumstances​

organizations.name: mln termination fee from co in certain circumstances​ reuters

text: March 1, 2018 / 1:47 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Amtrust Financial Says Evergreen Will Get $33 Mln Termination Fee From Co In Certain Circumstances​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - Amtrust Financial Services Inc: * AMTRUST FINANCIAL SERVICES-MERGER AGREEMENT PROVIDES EVERGREEN PARENT TO RECEIVE $33 MILLION TERMINATION FEE FROM CO IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES- SEC FILING‍​ Source text - bit.ly/2HUz6EZ
